system.description:
A 6’ diameter circle of fine black cloth, often found folded down to the size of a handkerchief. The cloth can be placed upon a surface to conjure a gateway to another world.

  • Placing on a surface: Creates a 6’ diameter hole in the surface.

  • Anything placed in the hole: Is transported to another world, plane, or dimension (as determined by the referee).

  • Returning: An identical hole exists at the destination location in the other world, allowing transit back and forth.

  • Picking up: When placed upon a surface, picking up the cloth causes the hole to disappear. The cloth can be picked up from either world.

  • Moving the hole: Picking up the hole and placing it in a different location opens a gateway to a different world, plane, or dimension.
